description: MCP Server for Bitrise, enabling app management, build operations, artifact management, and more.
name: io.github.bitrise-io/bitrise-mcp

headers.description: Bitrise Personal Access Token (format: 'Bearer YOUR_TOKEN'). Get your token from https://app.bitrise.io/me/account/security
headers.name: Authorization

headers.description: Comma-separated list of API groups to enable (e.g., 'apps,builds,workspaces'). Leave empty to enable all groups.
headers.name: x-bitrise-enabled-api-groups

title: Bitrise
